title: Former Intel CEO Pat Gelsinger confirms the industry is in an AI bubble, but that a pop could be several years away â€” 'Weâ€™re displacing all of the internet and the service provider industry as we think about it today'
summary: The former CEO says that we're in an AI bubble, but technological developments in AI efficiency will prevent it from bursting, at least in the near future.

title: New leadership keeping England refreshed - Capsey
summary: England all-rounder Alice Capsey praises the team's morale as they look to go four wins from four against Pakistan on Wednesday.
